Hi All
I am integrating between my junit and Ant.
So far I've been using the regular method such as the following target:
<target name="junit.test" depends="init" description="Run JUnit for the
AdminCenter project">
<echo message="testing only the local objects!"/>
<echo message="testing creation of objects"/>
<junit id="unit.test" fork="yes" haltonerror="true" dir=".">
<classpath >
<path refid="project.class.path"/>
<fileset dir="${ant.home}">
<include name="**/*.jar"/>
</fileset>
</classpath>
<jvmarg value="-Dtopaz.home=../.."/>
<test name="com.mercury.topaz.admincenter.app.db.AllTests"
/>
</junit>
</target>

Now I want to have things for general, i.e. have it run all the "AllTests"
under a specific directory, i.e. do something like
<classpath>
...
<fileset dir="${build.dest}"/>
<include name="**/*AllTests.class"/>
</fileset>
...
</classpath>
...
<test name="AllTests"/>

How should I do that?
TIA Oren
